summary: This is an email exchange between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) and another party regarding the logistics of obtaining and uploading a large amount of data from the FBI on the Epstein case to a shared system. The email coordinates the transfer of data via the FBI case agent.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, coordinating the logistics of obtaining FBI data on the Epstein case for uploading to a shared system.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The FBI possesses a large amount of data related to the Epstein case as of March 2019.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York is coordinating the transfer of this FBI data to a shared system.
An FBI case agent is involved in facilitating the data transfer.
The email exchange is logistical, focusing on how to get the data uploaded.
The correspondence indicates active investigation or evidence handling in the Epstein case in early 2019.
